alert.note: Alert for Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 2:14AM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...One More Round Of Snow, Wintry Mix This Morning... .As an area of moderate snow lifts northeast across northern Wisconsin, mostly north of Interstate 94, a brief break of an hour or two from the precipitation can be expected. Another area of snow to a wintry mix is quickly rotating northward out of Iowa however, returning one more round of precipitation. This area of mainly snow looks to shift north of Interstate 90 by mid morning, exiting into northern Wisconsin toward noon. Winds will continue drift snow, especially on ridge tops, higher terrain and open areas. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...ICE STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Wintry mix to snow. Snow accumulations of up to one inch and additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Iowa, Fayette and Clayton Counties. In Wisconsin, Grant County. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Iowa, visit 511ia.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
